scripts.build: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.vercel-build: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.setup:demo: cp .env.demo .env && echo 'Demo environment copied to .env. Update with your real API keys for full functionality.'
scripts.validate:env: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const {validateEnvironmentVariables, logValidationResults} = require('./backend/utils/envValidator'); const env = process.env.NODE_ENV || 'development'; const result = validateEnvironmentVariables(env); logValidationResults(result); console.log('\nFor production deployment, all environment variables must be set with real values.'); process.exit(result.isValid ? 0 : 1);"
scripts.validate:db: node -e "(async()=>{ if(process.env.DATABASE_URL){ const db=require('./backend/utils/database'); await db.connect(); console.log('DB OK'); await db.close(); } else { console.log('No DATABASE_URL set - using SQLite by default'); } })()"
